title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Tee Off the Future: How Technology Is Transforming Golf & Fan Engagement-SPF101
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-开球未来:技术如何变革高尔夫与粉丝互动-SPF101
abstract:
Explore how the PGA TOUR is reshaping the sport through advanced performance tracking, immersive broadcast enhancements, and data-driven storytelling that meets evolving fan expectations. Today's golf audiences demand more than passive viewing—they seek personalized experiences, deeper insights, and year-round digital connections. Discover how innovations in cloud computing, analytics, and AI are changing player performance analysis, tournament presentation, and interactive fan engagement. Learn how organizations are leveraging technology to deliver what modern audiences expect: real-time data, customized content, and immersive experiences that bring fans closer to the game.

Let’s examine the shifts in fan behavior and consumption patterns, revealing how the TOUR uses technology to create new touchpoints and deeper connections, embracing golf's digital future.
abstract_cn:
探索PGA巡回赛如何通过先进的性能追踪、沉浸式转播增强和数据驱动的叙事来重塑这项运动,以满足不断变化的球迷期望。当今的高尔夫观众不再满足于被动观看——他们寻求个性化体验、更深入的洞察和全年的数字化连接。了解云计算、分析和人工智能方面的创新如何改变球员表现分析、锦标赛呈现和互动球迷参与。了解各组织如何利用技术提供现代观众所期望的内容:实时数据、定制化内容以及让球迷更贴近比赛的沉浸式体验。

让我们审视球迷行为和消费模式的转变,揭示巡回赛如何使用技术创造新的触点和更深层次的连接,拥抱高尔夫的数字化未来。
